dmca.title: People Complains of Carey/Cannon Photo, Again
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

I am an attorney for Time Inc., the corporate publisher of People 
Magazine.  This will put you on notice of copyright infringements on a 
website hosted by Equinix, Inc.

Infringements of photographs of Mariah Carey and Nick Cannon that 
appear  the May 19, 2008 edition of People, have been detected on the 
website _http://digg.com_ at the following page(s): 
http://digg.com/celebrity/Mariah_Carey_and_Nick_Cannon_Wedding_Pictures. 
 

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section 
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the 
detected infringements.  I hereby demand that you _immediately_, as of 
May 9, 2008, issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036 (or 
otherwise block access), for the specified postings and prevent the 
infringer, who is identified by its Web address, from posting the 
infringing photograph(s) to your servers in the future. Please be 
advised that by law, as a service provider, you must "expeditiously 
remove or disable access to" the infringing photograph(s) upon receiving 
this notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of 
immunity under the DMCA.


I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner 
complained of herein is not authorized by People Magazine, its licensing 
representatives, or the law.
 

The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my 
knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized 
to act on behalf of People Magazine for matters pertaining to 
notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted 
material.



Please send to me at the address below a prompt response indicating the 
actions you have taken to resolve this matter.



Very truly yours,

_/s [private]           _
 
_______________________________

*[private]   *
Levine Sullivan Koch & Schulz
[private]   
New York, NY 10036
ph:  [private]   
fax: [private]   
[private]@lskslaw.com
dmca.principal_name: Time Inc., publisher of People Magazine
